name: New-JioSaavn HD(320/128kbps)Songs Downloader
description:
This Extension lets you download songs right from your browser, Download 320kbps and 128kbps High Quality songs without Saavn pro! No need to login :) 
 Play the music to be downloaded on www.jiosaavn.com and press Ctrl+z(320kbps) or Ctrl+q(128kbps) 
 For more awesome stuff like a chrome extension for jiosaavn that can even download a whole playlist with albumart, Check out my github: https://github.com/Skilled-Coder
author: Skilled-Coder
